examples.example: 我在这个年级里努力学习，不断进步，收获了很多知识和快乐。

translate.english: I study hard in this grade, make continuous progress, and gain a lot of knowledge and happiness.

examples.example: 新的年级是新的开始，我要更加努力去追求自己的梦想。

translate.english: The new grade is a new beginning, and I will work harder to pursue my own dream.

examples.example: 在新的年级中，我会以更加饱满的热情投入到学习和生活中去。

translate.english: In the new grade, I will devote myself to study and life with greater enthusiasm.
